messages.message: Hi, have been asked by a prospective if we will be able to extract signatures on AIHub. I understand we currently support signature detection, but do we have signature extraction on the roadmap at all?

Additionally; an add on question: Are there methods of interacting with signatures currently? Have tested the question
```Has the physician signed the document?```
on two documents, 1 without a signature and it seems confident on both that it had been signed (tested on both prod and pre prod) :
If you run this in Build, you can see the provenance. so while it doesn't currently extract the image, you can at least match and review it
^ the above bug currently doesnâ€™t seem to differentiate if the signature is there or not
Can you share these docs @Gwen ? cc: @Hari @Rakesh
I tried the screenshot in build and looks like it's interpreting the X as a checkbox and returning that
